# Terms by First Definition

```{r}
section2.1 <- read.csv("~/R project/LDAGlossary/csv/Section2-1.csv", header=TRUE,
                       na.strings=c("."), stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
table2.1 <- cbind(section2.1[1], section2.1[2])
names(table2.1) <- c("Term", "Chapter first defined")

section2.2 <- read.csv("~/R project/LDAGlossary/csv/Section2-2.csv", header=TRUE,
                       na.strings=c("."), stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
table2.2 <- cbind(section2.2[1], section2.2[2])
names(table2.2) <- c("Term", "Chapter first defined")

table2 <- rbind(table2.1, table2.2)
sort.table2 <- table2[order(table2$Term), ]
pander(sort.table2)
```
